鵹字的基本解释

鵹
lí
〔鵹黄〕黄鹂。亦称“仓庚”、“黄莺”。

鵹字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lí］
［《廣韻》吕支切，平支，來。］
传说中的鸟名。

鵹字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鵹； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1492第27
【廣韻】呂支切【集韻】鄰知切，?音離。與鸝離?同。【爾雅·釋鳥】鵹楚雀。【郭註】卽倉庚也。鳴則蠶生。又【集韻】良脂切，音梨。又憐題切，音黎。義?同。

鵹字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
鵹字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Buzzard
lí
〔鵹黄〕Yellow oriole. Also known as "Cang Geng" and "Huang Ying".
Buzzard
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [lí]
["Guangyun" Lu Zhiqie, flat branch, come. ]
The legendary bird name.
Buzzard
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　鵹; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 1492 Page 27
[Guang Yun] Lv Zhiqie [Ji Yun] Neighbors know and cut,? Sound is separated. Same as Li Li? 【Erya·Shiniao】Hui Chuque. [Guo's Note] Yi Canggeng also. Ming is silkworm. Also 【Jiyun】Liangzhi cut, sound pear. Pity the question again, Yin Li. Righteous? Same.
